title: A year of all Trump, all the time from Super Bowl to a ballroom
shortDescription: No president has been so ubiquitous in American life. From military incursions to primetime sports, Trump has been impossible to miss.

title: A look back at the last year with Trump in office
shortDescription: USA TODAY's Washington bureau chief Susan Page breaks down the last year with President Donald Trump.

title: Trump can now travel home on a street bearing his name
shortDescription: A 4-mile stretch that leads to President Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida, is now named after the president.

title: Street in Florida officially renamed after Trump
shortDescription: A four-mile stretch of road that leads to President Trump's Mar-a-Lago resort in Palm Beach, Florida is now named after the president.

title: Why did María Corina Machado give Trump her Nobel Peace Prize?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has long wanted the Nobel Peace Prize, and was gifted the medal awarded to Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado.

title: Machado pushes Venezuelan democracy. Trump eyes the country's oil
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado told President Donald Trump during a private White House luncheon her party had a mandate to lead.

title: Trump to pardon former Puerto Rican governor
shortDescription: President Donald Trump to pardon former Puerto Rican governor Wanda Vázquez.

title: Trump will keep Machado's Nobel Prize
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado presented her Nobel Peace Prize to President Trump, which the White House confirmed he will keep.

title: Trump to pardon former Puerto Rico governor in corruption case
shortDescription: President Trump is pardoning Puerto Rico's former governor, Wanda Vázquez Garced, who pleaded guilty last year to corruption charges involving briber.

title: Machado 'absolutely grateful' for Trump
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Macahdo says she's "absolutely grateful" for President Donald Trump.

title: In Denmark, members of Congress call Greenland an 'ally, not an asset'
shortDescription: A bipartisan delegation traveled to Copenhagen to reassure Danish leaders there isn't widespread support in Congress for a US takeover of Greenland.

title: Trump hints at using tariffs over Greenland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to impose tariffs on countries to pressure them into allowing the U.S. to annex Greenland.

title: Trump to hold on to Machado's 2025 Nobel Peace Prize: 'She offered it'
shortDescription: The Nobel Committee released a statement saying “A Nobel Prize can neither be revoked, shared, nor transferred to others."

title: What is Trump's approval rating? 58% say first year back is a failure
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has been back in office for almost a year. A new CNN/SSRS poll shows this year is seen poorly. What is his approval rating?
